import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './FilterModal.css'; function FilterModal({ filter, onFilterChange, onClose }) { const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState(filter.sortBy); const [genre, setGenre] = useState(filter.genre); const applyFilters = () => { onFilterChange({ sortBy, genre }); onClose(); }; return (

); } export default FilterModal;
